effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to burn the target.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to burn the target.

short_effect.black_white: Has a 20% chance to burn the target.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has a 20% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.black_white: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. It may leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. It may leave the target with a burn.
